author: Sheldon Pearce
title: Sturgill Simpson Announces Tour

organizations.name: nc - charlotte metro credit union amphitheatre

text:
Sturgill Simpson Photo by Mike Lawrie/Getty Images 
Sturgill Simpson is going on tour in support of his 2016 album, A Sailor’s Guide to Earth . The tour kicks off in Florida in March and concludes in October in Los Angeles. Find the full itinerary below. A Sailor’s Guide to Earth is nominated for Album of the Year and Best Country Album at this weekend’s 59th Annual Grammy Awards. 
03-04 Okeechobee, FL - Okeechobee Music & Arts Festival 05-06 Orange Beach, AL - The Wharf Amphitheater 07-07 Charlotte, NC - Charlotte Metro Credit Union Amphitheatre 07-08 Cary, NC - Koka Booth Amphitheatre 07-14 Atlanta, GA - Fox Theatre 07-15 Louisville, KY - Forecastle Festival 07-16 Birmingham, AL - Sloss Music & Arts Festival 07-30 Niigata, Japan - Fuji Rock Festival 09-07 Sugar Land, TX - Smart Financial Centre at Sugar Land 09-08 Grand Prairie, TX - Verizon Theatre 09-09 Austin, TX - Austin360 Amphitheater 09-14 New York, NY - Radio City Music Hall 09-15 Columbia, MD - Merriweather Post Pavilion 09-16 Boston, MA - Blue Hills Bank Pavilion 09-19 Detroit, MI - Fox Theatre 09-21 St. Louis, MO - Fox Theatre 09-22 Chicago, IL - Huntington Bank Pavilion @ Northerly Island 09-25 Morrison, CO - Red Rocks Amphitheatre 09-29 Portland, OR - Arlene Schnitzer Concert Hall 09-30 Redmond, WA - Marymoor Amphitheater 10-06 Los Angeles, CA - Greek Theatre Artists In This Story
